description:
Save time in your development cycles by starting with a precompiled Tcl distribution for out-of-the-box installation and standardization across the operating systems you rely on, including Windows, Linux and Mac OS X (as well as Solaris, AIX, and HP-UX in commercial Enterprise Edition). Develop once and deploy successfully across your production environment.

#### Features
* Precompiled Tcl distribution for out-of-the-box installation
* Core Tcl binaries
* TeaPot package manager
* Extended documentation


#### Community
* [Forum](http://community.activestate.com/forums/activetcl)

### Install directory
[`%ChocolateyBinRoot%`](https://github.com/chocolatey/choco/wiki/CreatePackages#installation-paths)

### Edition installed
Free [Community Edition](http://www.activestate.com/languages/compare-editions)
summary: Community edition distribution of the open source Tcl programming language
author: ActiveState Software Inc
